padcms.kiosk

Class FileStateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • padcms.kiosk.FileStateManager

  • public class FileStateManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Object of FileStateManager class converts values of processing file state which saves in SharedPreferences. It gives access to read and write state of file with unique name.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FileStateManager.FileState
      Object of FileState class describes state of processing file.

      • FileStateManager

        public FileStateManager(SharedPreferences prefs)
        Allocates a new FileStateManager object.
